thread.section_title: FTBbeauty.ca Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FTBbeauty.ca | ftbbeauty.ca
thread.title: Robyn

author: Robyn
title: Robyn
text: I really liked purchasing from the ftb site and I do hope it will reach the goal of being the Ulta of the North. Shipping was fairly fast and everything arrived in good shape. I found there to be a limited number of products which was disappointing but I do love the brands available. I do appreciate the slightly lower prices because savings are always great!! Keep up the great work, continue to grow and build.
